alert.note: Alert for Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Central Ventura County Valleys; Lake Casitas; Malibu Coast; Ojai Valley; Santa Susana Mountains; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Southern Ventura County Mountains; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 8:59PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...Strong showers and isolated thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Ventura and west central Los Angeles Counties through 930 PM PDT... At 857 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from Ojai to 6 miles southwest of Point Mugu. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down trees, tree limbs, and power lines, and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oxnard...Thousand Oaks...Simi Valley...Ventura...Camarillo... Fillmore...Malibu...Agoura Hills...Moorpark...Santa Paula... Port Hueneme...Point Mugu State Park...Newbury Park... Westlake Village...Point Dume...Oak Park...Somis...El Rio... Piru...and Lake Casitas. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
